name: Francis Quest
description:
Art Credit: Lanea Zimmerman.
Provided under: OGA By 3.0 license
Code Credit: atolVerderben (me!)
GitHub Repository

Francis Quest was originally done years ago, but I decided to move it to itch.io to see if there was any interest in this type of game. It uses only javascript for the game programming. I had a lot of fun developing it, but it was for the experience.

If there is any interest in this style of browser game I will pick back up the development, I'm just trying to allow as many people as possible to experience it!

Let me know below if you enjoyed the style and if I have enough feedback I will gladly restart development of Francis Quest!
